headline: Is VICI Properties A Hidden Opportunity After Recent Experiential Real Estate Expansion?
summary: If you are wondering whether VICI Properties is quietly becoming a bargain or if the market is already pricing it perfectly, this breakdown is for you. The stock has been drifting lower in the short term, down around 3.3% over the last week and 3.9% over the past month, even though it is still up 38.9% over 5 years. Recent headlines have focused on VICI expanding its portfolio of experiential real estate and signing new long term lease agreements, reinforcing its status as a key landlord on...
